recipes.title: Golden Roasted Chicken with Herbed Potatoes
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (356°F). In a large baking tray, combine the chicken legs, potato chunks, sweet potato chunks, and sliced onion. In a bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, dried oregano, chili flakes, salt, pepper, and chicken broth until well combined. Pour the sauce evenly over the chicken and potatoes in the tray, ensuring everything is well coated. Cover the tray tightly with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for approximately 1 and a half hours. Remove the aluminum foil, and with a spoon, gently sprinkle the juices from the tray over the chicken and potatoes to add moisture and flavor. Continue cooking until the chicken and potatoes are golden brown and fully cooked, achieving a crispy exterior and a tender, flavorful interior. Once golden and cooked through, remove from the oven. Let it rest for a few minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld together beautifully.

recipes.title: Cheesecake
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 180C. Grind the cookies in a blender, in a bowl mix them with oil. Put the cookie mixture is baking tray and press it with a spoon. Mix well all other ingredients, you can use a mixer. Pour the cheese mixture over the cookies and put the oven for 30 minutes. Then reduce the temperature to 110 C and bake the cake again for 40 minutes. Serve cooled with berries.
